creator: portto Co., Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Blocto is the easiest DApp browser ever created. With Blocto you can get access to a new class of applications, called DApps, that are based on blockchain technology.

Main features of Blocto:

1. Smooth User Experience
Blocto is designed to provide optimal user experience. Every single step of your adventure is thoughtfully designed. You can play with DApps easily without knowing too anything of the underlying blockchain technology.

2. Easiest Crypto Purchase
Blocto cooperates with payment services and crypto exchanges to provide the simplest crypto purchase experience with low fees. You can easily get any of the hundreds of crypto currencies in a few clicks.

3. Secure & Convenient
Blocto combines the best of both worlds, centralized and decentralized. It provides the security of decentralized wallets and the convenience of centralized ones.

4. Social Sharing
Everything is more fun with friends. With Blocto, you can invite your friends to join you in your favorite DApps, and get rewarded for it!

Download Blocto now and discover a whole new world on blockchain!

descriptionHtml:
Assets & dApps hub - one wallet to rule them all
- Manage your Ethereum/Flow/Tron assets easily in one wallet, 100+ tokens and digital collectables (NFT) displayed in one single tab
- Use your favorite dApps on the go, discover the blockchain world as you go: thousands of dApps supported
- Unified cross-chain experience, gas fee paid with blocto points across all supported chains
- Buy crypto directly with your credit card/Google & Samsung pay

Security - keep your crypto secure everywhere
- Access across multiple devices with simple email login
- Private key keystore encrypted with your recovery password
- Custodial and non-custodial mode supported, customize your wallet as you see fit

creator: portto Co., Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Blocto App is a secure cross-chain crypto wallet that allows you to quickly get started with all things crypto in one place. Trusted by millions of users and projects, Blocto is built for everyone—whether you’re new to blockchain or an experienced user already.

Blocto aims to make the Web3 community more accessible, offering a comprehensive Web3 ecosystem accessible through a reliable crypto wallet. Exchange cryptocurrencies, show off your NFTs, and learn about Web3 knowledge all in one place with Blocto.

What makes us the most user-friendly crypto wallet:
- Simple email log-in system
- Multi-chain support, including Aptos, Solana, Flow, Polygon, etc.
- Most popular projects supported, including NBA Top Shot, Yahoo, Line, etc.

title: Blocto: Crypto Wallet & NFTs

container.value: No. 253, Xinyi Rd. Sec. 2, Zhongzheng Dist., Taipei, Taiwan

creator: portto Co., Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Blocto App is a secure cross-chain crypto wallet that allows you to quickly get started with all things crypto in one place. Trusted by millions of users and projects, Blocto is built for everyone—whether you’re new to blockchain or an experienced user already.

Blocto aims to make the Web3 community more accessible, offering a comprehensive Web3 ecosystem accessible through a reliable crypto wallet. Exchange cryptocurrencies, show off your NFTs, and learn about Web3 knowledge all in one place with Blocto.

What makes us the most user-friendly crypto wallet:
- Simple email log-in system
- Multi-chain support, including Aptos, Solana, Flow, Polygon, etc.
- Most popular projects supported, including NBA Top Shot, Yahoo, Line, etc.
- Blocto Points, a point system to replace your transaction fees
- Staking program for you to earn passive income
- Crypto knowledge guide for beginners to learn and explore at the same time

BloctoSwap
- #10 DEX with native cross-chain bridges
- First DEX on Flow

Update: Blocto is now on Aptos! We’re happy to announce that we are part of the Aptos ecosystem as one of the top 3 wallets in Aptoverse. Enter the Aptoverse to swap and store $APT (the Aptos Token) in less than 30 seconds by simply logging on with Blocto Wallet.

Get started with our all-encompassing crypto wallet in 30 seconds.

Blocto. Tomorrows built together.

Blocto aims to make the Web3 community more accessible, offering a comprehensive Web3 ecosystem accessible through a reliable crypto wallet. Exchange cryptocurrencies, show off your NFTs, and learn about Web3 knowledge all in one place with Blocto.

What makes us the most user-friendly crypto wallet:
- Simple email log-in system
- Multi-chain support, including Aptos, Solana, Flow, Polygon, etc.
- Most popular projects supported, including NBA Top Shot, Yahoo, Line, etc.
- Blocto Points, a point system to replace your transaction fees
- Staking program for you to earn passive income
- Crypto knowledge guide for beginners to learn and explore at the same time

BloctoSwap
- #10 DEX with native cross-chain bridges
- First DEX on Flow

Update: Blocto is now on Aptos! We’re happy to announce that we are part of the Aptos ecosystem as one of the top 3 wallets in Aptoverse. Enter the Aptoverse to swap and store $APT (the Aptos Token) in less than 30 seconds by simply logging on with Blocto Wallet.

Get started with our all-encompassing crypto wallet in 30 seconds.

Blocto. Tomorrows built together.
